welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.detectedLanguage: I detected that your current language is {{language}}.
welcome.languageNotSupported: Unfortunately, I don't speak {{language}}, so I defaulted to english. However, If you feel more comfortable, I do speak spanish, so feel free to change to it by clicking the button below.
welcome.languageSupported: Remember you can always change the language by clicking the button at the top of the welcoming page
